mapper.select: SELECT payout_id, payout_billcode, bill_type, emp_id, emp_code, emp_name, dept_id, payout_type_id, apply_amount, apply_reason, apply_date, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, budget_id, budget_item_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_time FROM ctrl_payout WHERE payout_id = #{id}

SELECT payout_id, payout_billcode, bill_type, emp_id, emp_code, emp_name, dept_id, payout_type_id, apply_amount, apply_reason, apply_date, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, budget_id, budget_item_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_time FROM ctrl_payout WHERE payout_billcode = #{billcode}

SELECT payout_id, payout_billcode, bill_type, emp_id, emp_code, emp_name, dept_id, payout_type_id, apply_amount, apply_reason, apply_date, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, budget_id, budget_item_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_time FROM ctrl_payout WHERE emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT payout_id, payout_billcode, bill_type, emp_id, emp_code, emp_name, dept_id, payout_type_id, apply_amount, apply_reason, apply_date, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, budget_id, budget_item_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_time FROM ctrl_payout WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT payout_id, payout_billcode, bill_type, emp_id, emp_code, emp_name, dept_id, payout_type_id, apply_amount, apply_reason, apply_date, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, budget_id, budget_item_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_time FROM ctrl_payout ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT p.payout_id, p.payout_billcode, p.bill_type, p.emp_id, p.emp_code, p.emp_name, p.dept_id, p.payout_type_id, p.apply_amount, p.apply_reason, p.apply_date, p.status, p.process_definition_id, p.process_instance_id, p.budget_id, p.budget_item_id, p.remark, p.create_user, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM ctrl_payout p INNER JOIN wf_process_instance pi ON p.process_instance_id = pi.instance_id INNER JOIN wf_process_task pt ON pi.instance_id = pt.instance_id WHERE pt.assignee_user_id = #{userId} AND pt.task_status = 'PENDING' AND p.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctrl_payout (payout_billcode, bill_type, emp_id, emp_code, emp_name, dept_id, payout_type_id, apply_amount, apply_reason, apply_date, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, budget_id, budget_item_id, remark, create_user) VALUES (#{payoutBillcode}, #{billType}, #{empId}, #{empCode}, #{empName}, #{deptId}, #{payoutTypeId}, #{applyAmount}, #{applyReason}, #{applyDate}, #{status}, #{processDefinitionId}, #{processInstanceId}, #{budgetId}, #{budgetItemId}, #{remark}, #{createUser})
